CustomField.description: If checked timesheet cost/amount details will not be rollup on project and task after each save/update, instead a scheduled job will rollup these details (need to schedule 'SystemMaintenanceJob' manually).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked timesheet cost/amount details will not be rollup on project and task after each save/update, instead a scheduled job will rollup these details (need to schedule 'SystemMaintenanceJob' manually).
CustomField.label: Disable Timesheet Rollups
